name: CKEDITOR.skin
doc: Manages the loading of skin parts among all editor instances.

members.name: icons
members.doc: The list of registered icons. To add new icons to this list, use addIcon.

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the skin that is currently used.@todo

members.name: ua
members.doc:
The list of file names matching the browser user agent string from CKEDITOR.env. This is used to load the skin part file in addition to the "main" skin file for a particular browser.

Note: For each of the defined skin parts the corresponding CSS file with the same name as the user agent must exist inside the skin directory.@todo type?
members.short_doc:
The list of file names matching the browser user agent string from
CKEDITOR.env. ...

params.name: path
params.doc: The path to the icon image file.

params.name: offset
params.doc: The vertical offset position of the icon, if available inside a strip image.

params.name: bgsize
params.doc: The value of the CSS "background-size" property to use for this icon

members.name: chameleon
members.doc:
A function that supports the chameleon (skin color switch) feature, providing the skin color style updates to be applied in runtime.

Note: The embedded $color variable is to be substituted with a specific UI color.

params.name: editor
params.doc: The editor instance that the color changes apply to.

params.name: part
params.doc: The name of the skin part where the color changes take place.

members.short_doc:
A function that supports the chameleon (skin color switch) feature, providing
the skin color style updates to be appl...

members.name: getIconStyle
members.doc: Gets the CSS background styles to be used to render a specific icon.

params.name: name
params.doc: The icon name, as registered with addIcon.

params.name: rtl
params.doc: Indicates that the RTL version of the icon is to be used, if available.

params.name: overridePath
params.doc: The path to the icon image file. It overrides the path defined by the named icon, if available, and is used if the named icon was not registered.

params.name: overrideOffset
params.doc: The vertical offset position of the icon. It overrides the offset defined by the named icon, if available, and is used if the named icon was not registered.

params.name: overrideBgsize
params.doc: The value of the CSS "background-size" property to use for the icon. It overrides the value defined by the named icon, if available, and is used if the named icon was not registered.

members.short_doc: Gets the CSS background styles to be used to render a specific icon. ...

members.name: getPath
members.doc: Retrieves the real URL of a (CSS) skin part.
members.short_doc: Retrieves the real URL of a (CSS) skin part. ...

members.name: loadPart
members.doc:
Loads a skin part into the page. Does nothing if the part has already been loaded.

Note: The "editor" part is always auto loaded upon instance creation, thus this function is mainly used to lazy load other parts of the skin that do not have to be displayed until requested.

// Load the dialog part.
editor.skin.loadPart( 'dialog' );

params.name: part
params.doc: The name of the skin part CSS file that resides in the skin directory.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The provided callback function which is invoked after the part is loaded.

members.short_doc: Loads a skin part into the page. ...

members.name: path
members.doc:
Returns the root path to the skin directory.

@todo
members.short_doc: Returns the root path to the skin directory. ...
